name: Minty Meat Rolls
desc: A sour-and-spicy dish. The marinated meat has been thinly sliced and rolled into the mint leaves, before being brushed with a sauce blend containing Jueyun Chilis. The unique mint flavor adds the finishing touch to this dish, turning it into an excellent addition to any cold platter.

customize.name: Recipe: Minty Meat Rolls
customize.desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Minty Meat Rolls.

customize.name: Mint
customize.desc: A refreshingly cool ingredient. The cool, fresh flavor can cut through the heat of many dishes.

customize.name: Raw Meat
customize.desc: A fresh chunk of meat. Handled properly, it can be used to make delicious food.

customize.name: Jueyun Chili
customize.desc: A spicy plant native to Liyue. Merely smelling it makes one hot and thirsty.

customize.name: Delicious Minty Meat Rolls
customize.desc: A sour-and-spicy dish. The meat and mint are in exquisite equilibrium, tender and not greasy, delicate and not bitter. The spiciness awakens the twain's poetic balance with startling clarity as it leaps in your mouth, only to close with a sigh of perfection.

customize.name: Suspicious Minty Meat Rolls
customize.desc: A sour-and-spicy dish. The saltiness of the dipping sauce has completely covered the fresh flavor of the dish. If you don't wish to dilute it with water, then you'll just have to scarf it down with a big mouthful of rice.

value.text: Decreases all party members' gliding and sprinting Stamina consumption by 20% for 900s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

value.name: Minty Meat Rolls
value.desc:
Minty Meat Rolls

Though this might be its current form, think about it for a moment: did this dish first start as mint rolled around meat, or meat rolled around mint?
